Class AbstractEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.events.AbstractEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractInboxEvent, AbstractItemChannelLinkRegistryEvent, AbstractItemRegistryEvent, AbstractRuleRegistryEvent, AbstractThingRegistryEvent, ChannelTriggeredEvent, ConfigStatusInfoEvent, ExtensionEvent, FirmwareStatusInfoEvent, FirmwareUpdateProgressInfoEvent, FirmwareUpdateResultInfoEvent, ItemCommandEvent, ItemStateChangedEvent, ItemStateEvent, ItemStatePredictedEvent, RuleStatusInfoEvent, ThingStatusInfoChangedEvent, ThingStatusInfoEvent

    @NonNullByDefault
public abstract class AbstractEvent
extends Object
implements Event
    Abstract implementation of the Event interface.
